thread.title: Alan Shearer to undergo dementia tests after SHOCK findings link footballer to disease
thread.title_full: Alan Shearer to undergo dementia tests after SHOCK findings link footballer to disease

title: Alan Shearer to undergo dementia tests after SHOCK findings link footballer to disease
text: Alan Shearer to undergo dementia tests after SHOCK findings link footballer to disease Alan Shearer to undergo dementia tests after SHOCK findings link footballer to disease ALAN SHEARER will undergo a series of medical tests to find out if he is at risk of suffering dementia. PUBLISHED: 14:12, Thu, Feb 23, 2017 | UPDATED: 14:40, Thu, Feb 23, 2017 GETTY Alan Shearer will undergo dementia tests in an attempt to find out if he is at risk of the disease The former Newcastle United striker will investigate the latest scientific research from Britain and around the world, which claims that footballers could be at higher risk of developing the illness because of incessantly heading the ball in the sport. Fans will watch the star take the tests as part of his new BBC documentary, Dementia - Football's Silent Shame. Shearer will also delve further into study findings on Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy (CTE), a condition that is often sustained by boxers. Related articles
